【考法 1】 vt. 选派（演员） ： to assign (as an actor) to a role or part
【近】 He was cast in the leading role. 他是男一号。
【考法 2】 vt. 提出： to put forth, give off, to place as if by throwing
【例】 cast doubt on their reliability 对它们的可靠性提出质疑
【近】 discharge, emanate, irradiate, issue, shoot, throw out, give out
【考法 3】 v. 抛弃： to get rid of as useless or unwanted
【例】 once she became rich and didn't need them anymore, she cast off all her old friends like so much junk当她有钱了不再需要朋友了，她把老友像糟粕一样抛弃
【近】 ditch, dump, jettison['dʒetɪsən;]投弃, toss投掷
【考法 4】 n. 演员，演员阵容： a set of characters or persons
